## SubscribableStore interface

Represents a store accepting registrations (subscribers) and "pushing" notifications on each and every store value change.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface SubscribableStore<T> 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [subscribe(subscriber)](./tansu.subscribablestore.subscribe.md) | A method that makes it possible to register "interest" in store value changes over time. It is called each and every time the store's value changes. A registered subscriber is notified synchronously with the latest store value. |
